meanings.sent1: She feminizes her outfit with a pink scarf.
meanings.sent2: The artist feminizes the painting by adding delicate flowers.
meanings.sent3: The tough wrestler feminizes his appearance for a costume party.
meanings.sent4: The gentle music feminizes the atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The soft lighting feminizes the harsh lines of the room.

meanings.definition: To give a feminine quality to.
meanings.sent1: The floral pattern feminizes the room decor.
meanings.sent2: Her kind smile feminizes her face.
meanings.sent3: The strong warrior feminizes his battle tactics with grace.
meanings.sent4: The scent of lavender feminizes the air in the room.
meanings.sent5: The pastel colors feminize the overall look of the painting.

meanings.definition: To cause to adopt feminine characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The etiquette class feminizes her manners.
meanings.sent2: He feminizes his speech by using gentle tones.
meanings.sent3: The superhero feminizes his superhero costume for a charity event.
meanings.sent4: The role model feminizes her behavior to inspire others.
meanings.sent5: The mentor feminizes her guidance to empower young women.
